name: Beal Rope Marker
description: Specially formulated ink for marking the middle and end points of your climbing rope.Water and abrasion-resistant.Does not degrade polyamide.Enough to make 30 marks of 5cm each.Please note, this marker is recommended for Beal®, Blue Water, Edelweiss, Lanex, Maxim, PMI and Roca ropes These manufacturers have tested this product on their ropes. Other rope manufacturers have not tested this product and Beal does not endorse its use on other brands.
